Articles.Content: Has anyone made one? I'm buggered if I can make one that can deal with Kerbin's pesky atmosphere.

Has anyone made one? I'm buggered if I can make one that can deal with Kerbin's pesky atmosphere.

Check Wanderfound's craft thread. He's made more than 1. It should be noted, however, that self-refuelling and hauling are two different things and that he has so far only specialized in the former. The latter is genuinely difficult due to fuel requirements.

Has anyone made one? I'm buggered if I can make one that can deal with Kerbin's pesky atmosphere.

I made an SSTO that land on Minmus with a drill/ore tank/converter/solar panels. It then take off again and explore.
